column4: hi, i cant watch wmv in firefox. i can if i download them to the desktop and i view them outside firefox. I have w64codecs (i'm on hardy 64), i uninstalled totem, installed mplayer, the mplayer plugin is in about:plugin. usually i get the sound but not the video
wmv videos work fine with totem-plugin for me
thanks. indeed i am sure it is my problem, i just dont know how to solve it
reinstall totem and the mozilla plugin and also install "non-free-codecs". That should do the trick
